text: The 2017 Big Sky Conference Women's Basketball Tournament was a tournament that held from March 6-11, 2017 at the Reno Events Center. Montana State won their 2nd conference tournament title for the first time since 1993 and earns an automatic trip to the 2017 NCAA Tournament. ==Seeds== Big Sky Tiebreaker procedures are as follows:
